Section.name: iddialog_configpagedetail
Section.Property: You may change these options from the game's "Preferences" window later, if you wish.
Based on your computer's speed, memory, and video card, the Unreal Engine has selected the following detail options in order to optimize performance.

Section.name: iddialog_configpagefirsttime
Section.Property: The Unreal Engine is starting up for the first time. If you experience any problems, please read the release notes in the "Programs / Unreal Tournament" section of the Windows "Start" menu.

Section.name: iddialog_configpagesafemode
Section.Property: Run Unreal Engine in safe mode - for troubleshooting
The previous time the Unreal Engine was run, it was not shut down properly. In case the shut down was caused by a problem, you may use the options below for recovery.
Unreal Engine safe mode options: If you are experiencing problems, you may use the options below for recovery.
Visit our Web site for troubleshooting tips

Section.name: iddialog_configpagesafeoptions
Section.Property: Reset all configuration options to defaults
Safe mode options, for diagnosing problems
